data.name: It's Not Easy Being Greasy
data.description: Cause a Specimen to Die by Luring them into Bloat Acid.

data.name: Experimenticenticide
data.description: Kill 100 Specimens.

data.name: Social Outburst
data.description: Kill 8 Specimens with One Grenade.

data.name: Experimentimillicide
data.description: Kill 1,000 Specimens.

data.name: Straight Rush
data.description: Kill the Patriarch Before he has a Chance to Heal.

data.name: Philanthropist
data.description: Give 1,000 Pounds to Teammates who have 50% of Your Cash or Less.

data.name: Self Medicator
data.description: In Co-op Mode, Use Syringe on Yourself 100 Times.

data.name: I Like To Watch
data.description: Acquire 5 Minutes of "Zed-Time".

data.name: Random Axe of Kindness
data.description: Kill 15 Specimens with a Fire Axe in a Single Wave.

data.name: Homer's Heroes
data.description: Kill 100 Sirens.

data.name: Too Close For Comfort
data.description: Finish off a Fleshpound using a Melee Attack.

data.name: Careful Spender
data.description: Kill 4 Specimens with a Single Shot from a Hunting Shotgun.

data.name: Quarter Pounder With Ease
data.description: Turn 5 Fleshpounds into Giblets.

data.name: Getting Chunky
data.description: Obliterate 10 Zeds at once with the Pipe Bomb.

data.name: Fascist Dietitian
data.description: Kill 200 Bloats.

data.name: Let Them Burn
data.description: Get 1000 points of burn damage with the MAC-10.

data.name: Keep Those Sneakers Off the Floor!
data.description: Kill 20 Stalkers with Explosives.

data.name: The L.A.W. That Broke The Camel's Back
data.description: Deliver the Killing Blow to the Patriarch with a L.A.W. Rocket.

data.name: Flaming Hell, That was Close
data.description: As Firebug, kill the Husk with the Flamethrower before he hurts anyone.

data.name: It's What's Inside That Counts
data.description: Turn 500 Specimens into Giblets.

data.name: Experimentilottacide
data.description: Kill 10,000 Specimens.

data.name: Thin-Ice Pirouette
data.description: Complete 10 Waves when the Rest of your Team has Died.

data.name: Master Surgeon
data.description: As a Medic, Kill 8 Specimens using a Knife in a Single Wave.

data.name: Killer Junior
data.description: Kill 20 crawlers in mid-air with the M79 (explosive kill).

data.name: Bitter Irony
data.description: Kill 2 Scrakes with a Chainsaw in a Single Wave.

data.name: Healing Touch
data.description: Heal 200 teammates with the MP7's medication dart.

data.name: Hot Cross Fun
data.description: Kill 25 Burning Specimens with a Crossbow.
tips: Get a team mate to light specimens on fire before you shoot them.
It is also possible to use the MAC-10 as Firebug then quickly switch to the Crossbow.

data.name: SCAR'd
data.description: Kill 1000 Specimens with the SCAR.

data.name: Death To The Mad Scientist
data.description: Defeat the Patriarch on Suicidal.

data.name: Blooper Reel
data.description: Turn 500 Zeds into Giblets using the M79.
tips: Only works in solo mode!

data.name: Merry Men
data.description: Kill the Patriarch when everyone is ONLY using Crossbows.
tips: Playing in solo mode still counts, so just finish him off with the crossbow alone.

data.name: Pound This
data.description: Kill 100 Fleshpounds with the AA12.

data.name: Explosive Personality
data.description: As Demolitions, kill 1000 Specimens with the Pipebomb.

data.name: Mr. Perky
data.description: Get All of your Perks up to Level 5.

data.name: Dot of Doom
data.description: Get 25 headshots in a row with the EBR while using the Laser Sight.
tips: Don't forget to alt-fire to switch on the laser sight first.
The only real way to get this is to have a team mate take care of enemies like crawlers and stalkers which are hard to headshot, while you focus on clots, gorefasts, bloats and sirens.

data.name: Dignity for the Dead
data.description: Kill 10 Specimens Feeding on Dead Teammates Corpses.
tips: Very picky/buggy. There must be a wall between you and the specimens so they don't break out of the animation.
You can only get it by bouncing a grenade off another wall or being extremely quick to shoot when going around the corner.

data.name: Golden Potato
data.description: Get into GLaDOS' core on Aperture.
tips: Unweld the door in the central room of Aperture.
Best with at least 2 players, with 1 distracting the final Zed of the wave.

data.name: Uber Tuber
data.description: Expensive but delicious! Brought to you by Dr. Dougley and Lord Ned.
tips: Buy the Potato weapon which costs £70,000.
Does not work in solo mode!
To do legitimately, you need several players all going berserker on a long beginner game and collecting weapons to sell.

data.name: Ringmaster
data.description: Kill the "Ring Leader" (Circus Patriarch)

data.name: Clearing Clown Alley
data.description: Kill 5 Circus Bloats in one game.

data.name: Small Hands
data.description: Kill 3 Circus Clots in a wave with the Lever Action Rifle.

data.name: Sparring with a Master
data.description: Kill a Circus Gorefast with a Melee weapon.

data.name: Seeing Double
data.description: Kill 5 Circus Crawlers with a Bullpup in one wave.

data.name: Windjammer Enthusiast
data.description: Survive 10 seconds after being screamed at by at Circus Siren on Hard or above.

data.name: Elephant Gun
data.description: Land the killing blow on a Circus Fleshpound with a Pistol.

data.name: The Big Hunt
data.description: Kill a Circus Scrake with a Crossbow.

data.name: Burning up the Midway
data.description: Kill 10 Circus Clots with a Fire-based weapon.

data.name: Taking Down the Big Top
data.description: Kill 4 Circus Zeds in 1 ZED time chain with a Melee weapon.

data.name: Assistant Homicide
data.description: Kill 2 Circus Stalkers with a Melee weapon to the back in one wave.
tips: It is easiest to reach their back while they are targeting a team mate.

data.name: Lifting a Dumbell
data.description: Kill a Circus Husk with a LAW.

data.name: Punk'd
data.description: Unlock 10 of the 13 Circus Achievements along with any Abusement Park achievement.
tips: Requires at least 10 of Ringmaster, Sparring with a Master, Assistant Homicide, Seeing Double, Clearing Clown Alley, The Big Hunt, Lifting a Dumbell, Small Hands, Elephant Gun, Juggling Act, Windjammer Enthusiast, Taking Down the Big Top, and Burning up the Midway.
You also have to beat Abusement Park on at least normal difficulty.

data.name: Juggling Act
data.description: Drop 5 different Tier 2 weapons in one wave.
tips: The Fire Axe is the cheapest Tier 2 weapon, so play as berserker and save up enough to buy and drop 5 of them during one trading time.

data.name: British Superiority
data.description: Kill a zed each with both the Bullpup and FN-Fal

data.name: Combat Medic
data.description: Kill a zed that has injured a player (M7A3 rifle)

data.name: Spec Ops
data.description: Kill 12 clots with one magazine without reloading (MK23)

data.name: The Big One
data.description: Kill 2 scrakes with one shot (M99)

data.name: Fugly
data.description: Kill one of each type of zed in one round (HSG Shotgun)

data.name: Assault Flayer Ordinance
data.description: Push a scrake back with the direct fire from a Hunting Shotgun or alt fire from the Multi-Chamber ZED Thrower

data.name: Single-Load Doom Bombardier
data.description: Kill a ZED with a direct (unexploded) shot from the Orca Bomb Propeller or the M-79/M32
tips: If the shot hits a zed while within a certain distance from you, it won't explode but still do direct damage to the specimen it hits.

data.name: Guardian Assault Protector
data.description: Protect the ringmaster during the defense mission so that he does not get hit more than 15 times

data.name: Golden 3 Crown Note
data.description: Get all 3 gold bars without the carriers taking damage while they have them

data.name: Arcade Gamer
data.description: Complete the Pop the Clot, the Strong Man and the Grenade Toss games
tips: These can be found within the central area of theme park in Steamland.
It is easiest to complete this while the Ringmaster is waiting to be healed the first time in objective mode.
Pop the Clot: simply destroy all the clot heads.
Strong Man: throw a regular grenade onto the plate on the ground.
Grenade Toss: throw a regular grenade into each hole.

data.name: Single-shot Equalizer
data.description: Kill 4 different types of Zeds with headshots with 4 shots from the Long Musket or the M14 without reloading

data.name: Full Charge
data.description: Have 5 Breaker Boxes 100% repaired at the same time

data.name: Extended Motion Protector
data.description: Protect the Ringmaster during the escort mission so that he does not get hit more than 15 times

data.name: Hide and go Puke
data.description: Destroy all the Pukey the Clown dolls
tips: It is easiest to complete this while the Ringmaster is waiting to be healed the first time in objective mode.
A video guide to the locations by TMPGames.

data.name: Turbo Executioner
data.description: Kill 5 zeds in ZED time without reloading with Dr. T's LDS or Bullpup

data.name: Mrs. Punkd
data.description: Get 4 of 6 of the 2013 Summer Event in-game level Achievements, one Standard and one Objective Mode map completion Achievement, plus the Punk'd Achievement to unlock Steampunk Mrs. Foster
tips: Requires Punk'd.
Requires at least 4 of Hide and go Puke, Arcade Gamer, Full Charge, Guardian Assault Protector, Extended Motion Protector, and Golden 3 Crown Note.
You also have to beat Steamland in standard and objective mode on at least normal difficulty.

data.name: Oktoberfest Master
data.description: Collect all the Beer Steins
tips: A video guide to the locations by TMPGames.

data.name: Rich Evil Uncle
data.description: Collect all the Treasure Bags
tips: A video guide to the locations by TMPGames.

data.name: Nitro Boost!
data.description: Get the Nitro to the Objective in 135 seconds or less

data.name: Totally Metal
data.description: Kill 250 Zeds before completing the welding objective

data.name: Multi-pass
data.description: Pick up the door key
tips: Counts for all players when one person picks it up, so impossible to miss.

data.name: Science Hater
data.description: Destroy all the DNA vials
tips: Easier in normal mode than objective mode, because you can't go back to previous sections of the map. Some of the vials are also moved between modes.
A video guide to the locations by TMPGames.

data.name: Doctor WHO??
data.description: Get all Objective achievements and beat KFO Transit on Hard or above to unlock Dr Rachel Clamely
tips: Requires all 4 of Nitro Boost!, Totally Metal, Multi-pass, and Science Hater.
You also have to beat Transit in objective mode on at least hard difficulty.

data.name: Trick, not Treat
data.description: Kill 5 Halloween Specimens with any gun without reloading

data.name: Carving The Jack O' Lantern
data.description: Decapitate a burning Halloween specimen in Bedlam

data.name: Sparkling in the Twilight
data.description: Kill The Vampire Patriarch Ringmaster in Bedlam

data.name: The Scene is Zed
data.description: Kill 250 Halloween Specimens in Bedlam

data.name: Zed October
data.description: Win a Long Bedlam Match During the Halloween Event on Hard

data.name: This is No Ordinary Rabbit!
data.description: Kill 25 Halloween Scrakes in Bedlam

data.name: Rule The Roost
data.description: Get all 6 achievements and unlock Commando Chicken
tips: Requires Trick, not Treat, Carving The Jack O' Lantern, Sparkling in the Twilight, The Scene is Zed, Zed October, and This is No Ordinary Rabbit!.

data.name: Historical Remnants
data.description: Kill 6 Zeds with one magazine on an MKb42, without reloading

data.name: Nail'd!
data.description: Kill 4 Stalkers in a game with the Vlad9000 Nailgun

data.name: Meet Your Maker!
data.description: Kill 1000 Hillbilly Zeds

data.name: Soul Collector
data.description: Free the souls of the 25 Gnomes hidden on Hillbilly Horror in 1 game
tips: A video guide to the locations by snaphappy7530.

data.name: Fiery Personality
data.description: Set 3 Hillbilly Gorefasts on fire with the Flare Pistol or Trench Gun

data.name: I Am Become Death
data.description: Kill 5 Hillbilly Zeds in 10 seconds with the Scythe or Axe

data.name: Creepy Crawlies
data.description: Kill 15 Hillbilly Crawlers in 1 game with the Tommy Gun or MKb42

data.name: Rippin' It Up
data.description: Kill a Hillbilly Husk and another Hillbilly Zed in the same shot with the Buzzsaw Bow or M99

data.name: Grim Reaper
data.description: Get the 6 Special Halloween Achievements plus 1 Hillbilly Horror Map Achievement to unlock the Grim Reaper
tips: Requires Meet Your Maker!, Soul Collector, Fiery Personality, I Am Become Death, Creepy Crawlies, and Rippin' It Up.
You also have to beat Hillbilly Horror on at least normal difficulty.

data.name: Trench Warfare
data.description: Set a total of 200 Zeds on fire with the Trench Gun in Hillbilly Horror
tips: Specifically setting on fire, not killing, so play on a higher difficulty and try not to aim for the head.

data.name: Explosion of Love
data.description: Heal yourself plus 5 other players with one grenade
Win Fuel on the first try
tips: Basically down to luck. Only the first try of each machine counts, so you only get 2 chances per run.
The map KF-777 on the Steam workshop lets you cheat by spawning many more slot machines.

data.name: Ex-scientist
data.description: Collect all the bile without a contamination
tips: This means 0/3 other Zeds falling into the pit, not getting it on the first try.

data.name: Blinding Big Brother
data.description: Destroy all 30 Cameras
tips: Easier in normal mode than objective mode, because you can't go back to previous sections of the map.
A video guide to the locations by TMPGames.

data.name: Under The Weather
data.description: Use Bile or the Flamethrower to kill one of each Halloween Zed

data.name: Most Bang for the Buck
data.description: Kill 10 Halloween zeds in explosions using the Seeker 6 or the M32 within 5 seconds

data.name: Claw Machine Master
data.description: Attach the crane hook within 125 seconds

data.name: Fire and Forget
data.description: Kill a Halloween Fleshpound and Scrake in the same explosion with the Seal Squeal Harpoon Bomber or the LAW

data.name: Skull Cracker
data.description: Destroy all 30 Skulls
tips: A video guide to the locations by TMPGames.

data.name: Who Brings a Gun to a Snow Ball Fight?
data.description: Kill a Christmas Husk with any Pistol.

data.name: Merry Friggin Christmas
data.description: Kill the Christmas Patriarch.

data.name: Back to Work
data.description: Kill 20 Christmas Clots in one wave.

data.name: Rudolph, the Bloody Nosed Reindeer
data.description: Kill a Christmas Crawler with a Crossbow.

data.name: Eggnog Anyone?
data.description: Get covered in Christmas Bloat Bile and live for 10 seconds on Hard, Suicidal, or Hell on Earth.

data.name: Fending off Mrs. Claws
data.description: Kill 3 Christmas Stalkers with a Lever Action Rifle without reloading.

data.name: Toasted Jack Frost
data.description: Kill the Christmas Scrake with a Fire-based weapon.

data.name: Deck the Halls with Buckets o' Blood
data.description: Kill 3 Christmas Zeds in 1 ZED time chain with a Melee weapon.

data.name: Cracked the Nutcracker!
data.description: Land the killing blow on a Christmas Fleshpound with a Knife.

data.name: Can't Catch Me!
data.description: Kill 2 Christmas Gorefasts with a Melee weapon from behind in one wave.
tips: It is easiest to reach their back while they are targeting a team mate.

data.name: Bad Santa
data.description: Unlock 10 of the 13 Christmas Achievements along with any Christmas Map achievement.
tips: Requires at least 10 of Merry Friggin Christmas, Tis Better to Give than to Receive, Deck the Halls with Buckets o' Blood, Who Brings a Gun to a Snow Ball Fight?, Eggnog Anyone?, Back to Work, Fending off Mrs. Claws, Not So Silent Night, Cracked the Nutcracker!, Can't Catch Me, Toasted Jack Frost, Rudolph, the Bloody Nosed Reindeer, and That's not Santa!.
You also have to beat at least 1 of Santa's Evil Lair, Ice Cave and Moonbase on at least normal difficulty.

data.name: Tis Better to Give than to Receive
data.description: Drop 3 Tier 3 weapons for others (with which they kill at least one Christmas Zed).
tips: Tier 3 weapons refers to the M14, AA12 and SCAR.

data.name: Not So Silent Night
data.description: Kill a Christmas Siren with an undetonated LAW rocket.
tips: If the shot hits a zed while within a certain distance from you, it won't explode but still do direct damage to the specimen it hits.

data.name: That's not Santa!
data.description: Kill 3 Christmas Bloats with the Bullpup in one wave.

data.name: Bloody Yanks
data.description: Kill 1 specimen ONLY while expending a full M4 Assault Rifle magazine

data.name: A Bloody Christmas Carol
data.description: Kill 15 XMas Clots, 5 xmas Stalkers, 5 XMas Crawlers, 1 XMas Siren and 1 XMas Bloat.

data.name: Feeling Lucky?
data.description: Kill a specimen with every shot from your Revolver for one magazine
tips: Revolver refers to the .44 Magnum.

data.name: I love ze Healing not ze Hurting
data.description: Heal others for 3000 points of health with the MP5 SMG

data.name: We Have Ourselves a Cowboy
data.description: Hold dual 9mm, dual hand cannons and Dual Revolvers
tips: Revolver refers to the .44 Magnum.
If you have difficulty, try buying the single pistol then the second.

data.name: Finish Him
data.description: Hit a Scrake with the M203 Rifle grenade to kill him

data.name: Italian Meat Pasta
data.description: Kill 12 zeds with a full magazine from the Combat Shotgun

data.name: Highlander
data.description: Kill a Scrake, a Fleshpound, and the Patriarch with the Claymore Sword within one map

data.name: Burning Irony
data.description: Kill 15 Husks with the Husk Cannon
tips: You must kill the husk with direct damage from an explosion, not residual burning damage.

data.name: But It's All Red!
data.description: Collect all 16 Z.E.D. Gun pieces
tips: The parts are pretty easy to spot since they are aren't hidden like other object hunting achievements.
Check in particular on top of machines and the floors along the walls.
A video guide to the locations by overlord7777.

data.name: Gimli That Axe!
data.description: Get the Not-a-war-hammer Achievement in Dwarfs!?
tips: Either buy Dwarfs!? or play the free version and collect 40,000 gold, which takes about an hour at most.

data.name: Game Over, Man!
data.description: Have 20 Zeds you slowed with the Z.E.D. gun killed

data.name: Have my axe
data.description: Kill 30 Fleshpounds with the Dwarfs!? axe with back attacks
tips: It is easiest to reach their back while they are targeting a team mate.

data.name: One Small Step for Man
data.description: Kill 500 Zeds with the Schneidzekk Medic Gun while you are falling
tips: Basically just jump and shoot while you come back down.
Easiest on Moonbase.

data.name: No Time for Love, Dr. Jones
data.description: Win a short round on KF-Hell playing as or with Harchier Spebbington

data.name: All shook up
data.description: Destroy all 15 Snow Globes
tips: A video guide to the locations by TMPGames.
